SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.view

Class FridgeViewBuilder

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.view.FridgeViewBuilder
public class FridgeViewBuilder extends Object
Provides utility methods for creating UI components related to a fridge interface. This class handles the construction of various visual elements used to display and edit items in a fridge.

    Constructs a FridgeViewBuilder.

  • Method Details

    • getFridgeGroup

      public javafx.scene.Group getFridgeGroup()
      Creates and returns the main container for the fridge UI as a Group containing a VBox.
      Returns:
      A Group containing an empty VBox with ID 'fridge-container'.

    • getFridgeHbox

      public javafx.scene.layout.HBox getFridgeHbox(String name, String amount, String unit)
      Creates an HBox for displaying fridge item details including name, amount, unit, and edit functionality.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item.
      amount - The amount of the item.
      unit - The unit of the item amount.
      Returns:
      An HBox containing labels and buttons for item manipulation.

    • getEditFridgeHbox

      public javafx.scene.layout.HBox getEditFridgeHbox(String name, String amount, String unit)
      Creates an HBox for editing fridge item details, including interactive elements for changing amount.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item.
      amount - The initial amount of the item.
      unit - The unit of the item amount.
      Returns:
      An HBox containing interactive elements for item editing.

    • getFridgeEdit

      public javafx.scene.Group getFridgeEdit(String name, String amount, String unit)
      Creates a Group containing UI elements for editing a fridge item with actions to save changes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item.
      amount - The initial amount of the item.
      unit - The unit of the item amount.
      Returns:
      A Group with interactive elements to edit and save fridge item details.
